content: The Tridacna Pendant is one of the various Curios pieces of equipment you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. This large Curios item offers a universal buff that can be useful for almost anyone practically.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tridacna_Pendant.md', within the main section titled 'Tridacna Pendant'.
The content is as follows:
The Tridacna Pendant is one of the various Curios pieces of equipment you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. This large Curios item offers a universal buff that can be useful for almost anyone practically.
